attributes.comment:
As a citizen of the United States of America, and in the process of adopting a
child from China, I must protest the proposed fee increases for the I-600A, N-565
and N-600. The fees for issuing these applications is already at a steep level and
in light of the paperwork for the I-600a having to be renewed since the I171H is
only good for 18 months, prospective parents are having to pay this fee twice and
in the future, possibly three times. None of us reached this decision to adopt
lightly and the financial burden is a major consideration. Having our government
raise these fees so steeply is appalling as it is not enough to keep us from
proceeding with our plans but truly an added burden for americans who only desire
to bring their child home.
Thank you for your time.
Maureen Mann

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Maureen C. Mann
